alert.note: Alert for Doddridge; Ritchie; Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 10:47PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A heavy thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ritchie, western Doddridge and southeastern Tyler Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1046 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy thunderstorm 9 miles east of Harrisville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pennsboro, West Union, Pullman, Auburn, Alma, Smithburg, Wick, Mountain, Greenwood, Berea, Canton and Grove. This includes Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 41 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
